reviews.sentence: disgusting old and in disrepair. The pool is closed due to needed repairs and they had no anticipated completion date and the internet did not alert customers prior to reservation and arrival. It clearly SAYS IT HAS A POLMY ROOM WALL PAPER IS MARRED ALL OVER DIRTY AND GRIMY. the ac toilet and closet door are broken. The closet door is hanging off. how can the maid not see these issues and reportThe bathroom has 2 water pipes and 1 sewar pipe protruding thru the wall. 15 ft and then entering the sink cabinet. The bathroom has sifted and there is a 15 gap in the tile. The repair man came and repaired the AC and closet door. it took about 30 minutes. He had to leave for parts and then come back to replace the entire internal toilet mechanism. In all the repairs took 1 hour. Should a guest really need to diagnose and then sit here while the repairs are being completedThe manager was not concerned and acted like it was normal for guests to fix the hotel issues. I would NOT stay here again. I think I will cancel my IH Preferred Guest Membership. Warning do not stay here.

Close to highwayOld hotel. Room had a mold like smell. AC does not work. We requested if possible for a renovated room the rep said nothing has been renovated in 7 years. I have stayed at 2 stars hotel that is better than this.

Has lots of potential. The checking in and out process was quick and easy via Expedia. The location and layout of the hotel was nice enough. Not too bad getting in and out of traffic. Immediate access to major highway. The bar area was very nice. The room itself was ok a bit small for 2 beds and hubby and I barely fit on the bed together. But it was ok for 2 nights. My biggest disappointments were the cleanliness and upkeep of the hotel as a whole and the fact that the indoor pool was not open. The hotel SERIOUSLY needed a deep cleaning and repairs. Elevators foyers and carpet were disgusting. There were dirty glasses on the 2nd floor piano area both days I was there. NO ONE bothered to clean up the place. The ceiling tiles were sagging and threatening to fall at any given moment. This hotel is beautiful and has a lot of potential to be great. However its 4 5star potential is drastically overshadowed by it is 1star upkeep. Had I paid full price I would have been highly upset and demanded a refund. The layout was beautiful. Reminded me of a Great Gatsby scene. Plenty to do nearby. My family and I went to Medieval Times Galleria Mall and USA Bowl. Had a blast. Location provides quick access to major highway CLEANLINESS and upkeep.

Ups and Downs. If you want a fancy updated hotel this is not the place for you. If you just need somewhere comfortable to stay that is close to the airport. sure. My stay would have been so much better if the MANAGERS at the front desk were not so rude. I had a problem trying to find a way to gear up my food because hardly any of the rooms have microwaves and there is not one accessible in the lobby. The other people at the front desk and my the person who delivered room service were very nice though.

Inexpensive place to stay near Love Field close to good restaurants. The staff is really great welcoming and very friendly and profesionalit is an old hotel and we usually stay here the night before we fly out of Love Field for an early morning flight. The bathroom sink drained really slowly makeup mirror did not work and the hotel needs to be generally updated. The lighting is pretty bad in the rooms also and wifi is super slow. However for one night an inexpensive place to stay by the airport and the friendly staff these minor annoyances are doable for me.
Affordable and convenient. This is an older property that could use some updates but overall it was acceptable for the price.

Old hotel needs many repairs. This is a very dated hotel. Rooms are tiny and not very accommodating at all. We ended up having to switch rooms 3 times during our 5 night stay due to clogged sink in one room sewage backed up in another and the a c was out in the next room. Housekeeping also took some personal items from our room and the manager gave us a credit for the items missing. Overall bad experience. The whole place needs a complete overhaul.

The hotel is old. in desperate need of a remodel. it ’s a bit overpriced. the AC did n’t work well in my room. the staff was 100 awesome. everyone was super nice. the bed and pillows were so comfy it made up for the AC not working right. I’d stay here again just for the pillows and bed.
The staff was delightful. The hotel is very old and needs updated.
Room needed repairs on walls. also need cleaning on areas like the lamps.

To be fair the hotel is undergoing a renovation. If I had known that I would have booked elsewhere. The temporary entrance is around back and could use better signage and lighting. The elevators are not cooled so it was very hot. The AC in our room only marginally worked. I am sure it will be nice after the renovation but in the meantime there are plenty of other nice places in the area.
Newly renovated room very nice and clean.
Well hotel in under a most needed renovation. Great customer service. No gym to get a good workout but hopefully after the renovation there will be one.
The hotel is being remodeled totally. This did not bother me. I received a newly remodeled room which was lovely. The staff was excelant.

Decent hotel great hospitality. The hotel is being remodeled so there ’s the usual noice and dust that go along with that. I got a room that was recently renovated and it was great. Keurig and small microwave in the room comfortable bed and very nice bathroom. Robert at the front desk was great. Beyond helpful informative and went the extra mile when I needed something printed. Only downside it ’s next to a freeway which makes traveling by foot difficult. If you have a car you should be fine.

Even with major reconstruction going on staff was courteous and helpful. The food was excellent try the salmon and kale special Room are spacious modern and the bed wo n’t let you go away from it for too long. Great Stay.

Exceptional. The room was clean newly renovated and very comfortable. Great valueThe renovation could be a little cleaner. Lots of dirt and dust in the elevators and areas where the crew has been in and out but they were not at all a disturbance.
Service was very personalized and friendly. I was in a newly remodeled room which was very nice. The rest of the building was a bit of a mess at the time due to remodel.

Exceeded my expectations. This past week when I visited Dallas for an interview I had the absolute pleasure of staying at the Crown Plaza. Normally this hotel brand is not high on my list of must visit establishments but from the moment I stepped into the hotel I had to reevaluate my thinking. What made it so special you ask. The hotel has been renovated from top to bottom and was beautifully decorated for the holiday season. But more than that the people who work at this hotel are what made this stay so memorable. I would like to say a big thank you to Rene Rolando Andrew and the rest of the hotel staff for their excellent hospitality and heart. If I ever find myself in need of a hotel near Dallas Love again I know without a doubt where I will stay.

Nicely Renovate. Have stayed at this property many times through the years although this is the first stay in 8 years. I was pleasantly surprised that both the rooms and lobby have been tastefully renovated. As always the staff is very friendly and helpful. I really enjoyed my stay.
